channel.title: Gluster+openshift on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Gluster+openshift on purpleidea.com

item.title: Linuxcon day two, Tuesday
item.description: Continuing on from yesterday, I’ve met even more interesting people. I chatted with Dianne Mueller about some interesting ideas for gluster+openshift. More to come on that front soon. Hung out with Jono Bacon and talked a bit about puppet-gluster on Ubuntu. If there is interest in the community for this, please let me know. Thanks to John Mark Walker and RedHat for sponsoring me and introducing me to many of these folks.
